summary: A man hires an ex-con to kill his sister's abusive husband, but the desperate act sets into motion a shocking series of events in this intense indie drama.
cast: Fran Kranz|Jocelin Donahue|Kenny Wormald|Chris Mulkey|Joelle Carter|Erin Cummings|NiCole Robinson|Andy Sandberg|Brian McMinimee|Jesse Ruser|Daniel Dorrian|Dave Weidler|Steve Cavanaugh|Sonja Mauro|Lawton Paseka|Melissa Burke|Cat Collins|Billy Minnig|Saragrace Minnig|Janelle Moyer|Rori|Allyson Schulze|Michelle Schulze|Joe Smerko|Charlie Thomas
title: The Living
